show.description: Show details about a specific callout

messages.done: When you are finished with your response, just type "{done}".
messages.enter-content: Please reply with a single message. You can make it as long as you want.
messages.enter-lots-of-text: Please reply with a single message. You can make it as long as you want.
messages.enter-password: Please enter a password. I will remind you to delete the message once you have sent it.
messages.enter-text: Please keep your response brief, ideally in one sentence.
messages.enter-url: Please enter a web address. (e.g. www.beabee.io)
messages.multiple-emails-allowed: Enter one or more e-mail addresses.
messages.multiple-selections-allowed: Please type in the answer number. You can pick multiple choices, just send a separate message for each.
messages.multiple-values-allowed: You can enter multiple values by sending each value in a separate message.
messages.only-one-selection-allowed: Please pick your choice by typing its number or pressing its button (you can only pick one).
messages.upload-files-here: Please send me one or more files.

message.select-detail-callout: ‚ùì Which Callout would you like to get more information about? Choose a number.

messages.callout-not-found: I'm sorry, I couldn't find this callout.
messages.callout-start-response: Would you like to respond to this callout?
messages.no-active-callouts: There are currently no open callouts.
messages.not-a-selection-message: Please select the number of one of the possible answers.
messages.not-the-right-file-type: Please send a file of type {type}.
